directions.step:
Place beans in crockpot the night before you plan on making chili. Cover with water. DO NOT add salt or anything else at this point. Cook on low over night (8 - 10 hours). Drain. AFTER the beans are SOFT, add b-b-q sauce and little smokies and cook on low 5 to 6 hours.
Recipe by: me
Posted to TNT Recipes Digest by Karin <iluv2cook@prodigy.net> on Feb 21, 1998
